fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You have the ability of every ||                                || role (except this one) in <#970046125065265202> and can multitask.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The number of votes you have is the same as the number of ||                                    || roles in <#970046125065265202>.
- If you would otherwise die, instead a random ||                                    || part of you dies, and you lose that vote. Yes, the host has to keep track of this. If you somehow run out of ||                                    || roles, you actually die.
